features: Will creation and legacy planning tools
Guardian assignment and emergency access features

The service is not a substitute for professional legal advice, and we cannot guarantee the legal validity of documents created using our platform in all jurisdictions.

The "Will Generator" and other features produce documents based on templates and user-provided data. These are not a substitute for professional advice from a qualified lawyer or financial advisor. We strongly recommend you consult with a professional to ensure your will and estate plan are legally valid and suit your specific situation.

You acknowledge that the ultimate security of your data also depends on you protecting your account password and recovery keys.
